mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMU (cm_bno, cm_title, cm_content, cm_date) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMMU.NEXTVAL, #{cm_title}, #{cm_content}, sysdate);
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_COMMU SET cm_title = #{cm_title}, cm_content = #{cm_content}, cm_date = sysdate WHERE cm_bno = #{cm_bno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_COMMU ORDER BY cm_bno DESC
